title: Town Moto
description:
Town Moto is a motorcycle shop in Toronto on the busy and trendy street of Ossington Ave. As the digital designer, my responsibilities were to design and brand the store’s social media posts, flyers, and posters both in-store and on the website.

With a heavy focus in lifestyle photography, I worked in conjunction with a photographer to art direct photography used for the company’s social media platforms and website’s product images.

My role: Art Direction, Design
